aboutme.details: If you have any features youd like to suggest or bugs youd like to report please message Walkire about them. I am very new so any help would be appreciated :). twitch.tv/walkire
aboutme.args: Hello, I am foxbrobot! :D I am a moderator twitch bot created by twitch user: Walkire

points.details: shows how many points you or another user has, everyone gets 1 point every 5 seconds in chat

leaderboard.details: Shows top 5 users with the highest points

bet.details: try your luck in a game of chance!

raffle.details: start, end or enter a raffle. Only host can start or end raffle

help.details: Show help list, or a detailed description of one command
